  physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are \u0027L\u0027 shaped
 featuring cottom weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a thin orange border. They are decorated with stylized weavings depicting stylized figures
 birds
 and dieties in rectangular panels.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cottom weave with embroidery work. The hangings have a thin orange border. They are decorated with stylized weavings depicting stylized figures, birds, and dieties in rectangular panels.
